Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 42nd overall pick, by Detroit in 1972...
Traded from Detroit to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1973 (Going to CHC: P F. Martinez, 3B L. Parrish. Going to DET: P D. Hughes, LF C. Yastrzemski)...
Earned first career win on 8/14/1975...
Won World Series with Chicago (N) in 1975...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Traded from Chicago (N) to St. Louis on 1/31/1981 (Going to STL: P B. Farmer, P F. Martinez, C J. Harrell. Going to CHC: SS A. Trammell)...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/19/1985 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from St. Louis to Chicago (N) on 3/2/1986 (Going to CHC: P F. Martinez. Going to STL: 3B D. Magadan, P M. Schooler)...
